text.#text:
None of
			 the amounts appropriated in any Act for the Community Oriented Policing
			 Services Program may be used in contravention of

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 642(a) of the Illegal
			 Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Illegal Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996/s:642/ss:a

header.#text:
Restriction of COPS funding
			 for sanctuary cities

current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To prohibit appropriated funds from being used in
		  contravention of section 642(a) of the Illegal Immigration Reform and Immigrant
		  Responsibility Act of 1996.
